body_html:
It seems that the Rust bindings are building on top of c_api.h using the approach outlined in the how-to, which is great.

If you run into concerns with the documentation or the C-API, please do create a separate issue

Thanks!

It seems that the Rust bindings are building on top of c_api.h using the approach outlined in the how-to, which is great.
If you run into concerns with the documentation or the C-API, please do create a separate issue
Thanks!
body:
It seems that the Rust bindings are building on top of [c_api.h](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h) using the approach outlined in the [how-to](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/language_bindings/index.md), which is great.

If you run into concerns with the documentation or the C-API, please do create a separate issue

Thanks!
